messages.title: Stronger Economy. Fairer Society. Opportunity for Everyone.
messages.content: With Labour and the Conservatives out of the race here in Gordon, there is a clear choice to be made in this election. With your support Christine will continue working to build both a stronger Scotland AND improve local services for everyone in Gordon.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The SNP has let Scotland down badly on health. They've shamefully allowed cancer treatment targets to be missed across Scotland, and the Scottish NHS to go into a bed to bed crisis.

mentions.candidate: Christine will be a great MP for Gordon. She has worked hard here and, before that, in Donside, and we've been warmly received everywhere.
mentions.partyLeader: Malcolm Bruce - Former MP for Gordon
mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race between the Lib Dems and the SNP here in Gordon.

issues.health: The SNP has let Scotland down badly on health. They've shamefully allowed cancer treatment targets to be missed across Scotland, and the Scottish NHS to go into a bed to bed crisis.

leaflet.personalStatement: Christine Jardine will be a great MP for Gordon.

politicalExperience.achievements: I have achieved a lot for Gordon over my time with your support, and right now about shaking Westminster to its core for you, to win an even tougher fight for our local area and stand up for the issues affecting you and your family.

endorsements.endorser: Malcolm Bruce - Former MP for Gordon
endorsements.endorsement: Christine Jardine will be a great MP for Gordon.
